mapper.select: SELECT UNO, PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_COUNT FROM PRODUCT_CART WHERE PRODUCT_CART_NO = #{productCartNo} and UNO = #{uno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERPAGE (ORDER_NO, ORDER_GROUP, UNO, PRODUCT_ID, ORDER_QUANTITY) VALUES( ORDERPAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{orderGroup}, #{uno}, #{productId}, #{orderQuantity})
mapper.select: SELECT USERINFO USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL FROM USERINFO WHERE UNO = #{uno}
SELECT PRODUCT_ID, PRODUCT_TITLE, UNO, PRODUCT_PRICE FROM PRODUCT_BOARD WHERE PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}

SELECT OP.ORDER_NO, OP.ORDER_GROUP, OP.UNO, OP.PRODUCT_ID, OP.ORDER_QUANTITY, U.USER_NAME, U.PHONE, U.EMAIL, PB.PRODUCT_TITLE, PB.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM ORDERPAGE OP JOIN USERINFO U ON OP.UNO = U.UNO JOIN PRODUCT_BOARD PB ON OP.PRODUCT_ID = PB.PRODUCT_ID WHERE OP.ORDER_GROUP = #{orderGroup}
